channel.title: Restricing items

item.title: Restricing items
item.dc:creator: @coolman44445 coolman44445
item.description:
@coolman44445 wrote:

so, I added this:
if (playerRights >=2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Zazima Souck”)) {
playerEquipment[wearID] = 773;
} else if (playerRights < 2) {
sendMessage(
“You have to be admin+ to wear this!”);
return false;
}

and it worked, but where do I have to place it? I did something wrong and I couldn’t wear any item or I would get kicked, I removed this code and it was all fine. But now it doesnt restrict anymore, so where do I have to place this??

Tyvm[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 23, 2009, 10:12:27 am[/size][hr]anyone?? :mad:

else if (playerRights < 2)) {
return = false;

that is a very rough copy of what it might look like. You will probably have to change stuff around and add somethings

item.title: Restricing items
item.dc:creator: @coolman44445 coolman44445
item.description:
@coolman44445 wrote:

Hi guys, does any1 know what code to use to restrict items, i got to this far:

if (playerrights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Zazima Souck”)) &&
(playerEquipment[targetSlot] != wearID
&& playerEquipment[targetSlot] >= 0) {
addItem(playerEquipment[targetSlot],
playerEquipmentN[targetSlot]);
resetItems(3214);
} else if (Item.itemStackable[wearID]
&& playerEquipment[targetSlot] == wearID) {
wearAmount = playerEquipmentN[targetSlot] + wearAmount;
} else if (playerEquipment[targetSlot] >= 0) {
addItem(playerEquipment[targetSlot],
playerEquipmentN[targetSlot]);
resetItems(3214);

so, now how do I restrict p ring? (item nr. 773)
sincerally,
Coolman44445 aka Zazima Souck

Read full topic
